text: Mariyu yudamatam avalambincina variki memu gollu unna anni jantuvulanu nisedhincamu. Mariyu variki avu mariyu mekalalo, vati vipulaku leda pregulaku tagilivunna mariyu emukalalo misramamai unna krovvu tappa, migata (krovvunu) nisedhincamu. Idi vari akramalaku vidhincina siksa. Mariyu niscayanga, memu satyavantulamu
